attributes.action: Allow citizens to assess and manage their own covid risks.
attributes.additional_details: Allow citizens to make their own decisions about what is right for them based on facts and information available. Provide accurate information about the risks and allow citizens to determine what level of risk they are willing to accept.
attributes.background: Including exercise, schooling, socialising and working. Basically, to stop treating your citizens like children and allow them to assess their own risk and make their own choices.
